snippet: A federal judge on Wednesday issued a new order blocking Louisiana from enforcing a law that he says would keep most women from receiving abortions.
abstract: Federal Judge John deGravelles orders Louisiana to stop enforcing law that requires doctors who perform abortions to be able to admit patients to hospital within 30 miles; says law would impede most women's ability to get abortions.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday issued a new order blocking Louisiana from enforcing a law that he says would keep most women from receiving abortions.

headline.main: Louisiana: Judge Again Blocks Abortion Law
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Judge Again Blocks Abortion Law
